message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm eager to find a deal that works, I'm holding firm on a price closer to $1,550,000 for this product.  Its value is undeniable, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,450,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
